The test was performed on the build of  Aperi-R04-070802-233101.zip  (replaces rhinojs.jar with js.jar, updates gui)
*** Bug 165532 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Encountered similar problems with other CIMOMs that needed username/pw.
Reason for this bug come from some Resource Leaks in the sblim CIMClient interacting with a WBEM CIMOM.

The latest sblimCIMClient version 1.3.3 fixes this bug.

Workaround until the Aperi CVS is updated with the latest CIMClient version:
Download the sblimCIMClient from http://sourceforge.net/projects/sblim/

and replace the sblimCIMClient.jar file in the Aperi-plugin directory org.sblim.cim.client

Eclipse legal has approved our use of the SBLIM CIM Client 1.3.3 
Created Bugzilla 209115 to get it into the build
It had been fixed at Aperi-incubation-R04-071119-123514.zip build
